_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: golang generic pro
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description:
A generic golang egg that compiles the application and saves an executable

Meant to be customized before it is used.

애플리케이션을 컴파일하고 실행 파일을 저장하는 일반 golang egg입니다.

사용 전에 사용자 정의가 필요합니다.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# golang generic package


if [ ! -d /mnt/server/ ]; then
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server

if [ -f go.mod ]; then
    go mod download
fi

go build -o ${EXECUTABLE}

echo "Build complete"

variables.name: Go Package
variables.description: Go package to get and build

variables.name: Executable
variables.description: This is the executable from the build.
